attributes.action: implement in full the recommendations of the Parliamentary Ombudsman for compensation to Equitable Life Policyholders who have suffered injustice and loss due to maladministration.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By signing EDM 1423 Parliamentary Ombudsman and Equitable Life Policyholders 328 MP's showed clearly that they do not believe that the Government's current proposals are sufficient to remedy the injustice to the victims of the Equitable Life saga.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
